title: Presentation: Saline and Sodic Soils: Understanding Differences and Management Solutions

tasks.task: Presenting a seminar on salinity and sodicity issues in South Dakota soils
subtasks: Understanding the causes and impacts of salt-related soil problems in South Dakota
Discussing the differences between saline and sodic soils
Explaining soil testing methods for salinity and sodicity
Recommending management strategies for salt-affected soils, including soil amendments and cover cropping
Sharing research findings on the effectiveness of various management practices in South Dakota
Addressing questions from attendees regarding soil salt management and practices
